attributes.action: Stop the closure of Lacock post office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like you to petition the Prime minister to stop the closure of Lacock post office in Wiltshire. Lacock known for its beautiful village and Abbey is also known for being a setting for many films, it holds a very close commuity and the feeling is this could sound a death knell for a reasonably sucsessfull small commuinty.
The post office is located within Lacock Stores which could also be put under threat of closure if it loses its post office.
